mapper.select:
select ci.id, ci.expert_code, ci.enterprise_code, ci.create_date, ei.name as expertName, ei.images as expertImages, ei.employer, ei.`position`, ei2.name as enterpriseName, ei2.images as enterpriseImages from collect_info ci left join expert_info ei on (ei.code = ci.expert_code) left join enterprise_info ei2 on (ei2.code = ci.enterprise_code) where 1 = 1
AND ei.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.expertName},'%')
AND ei2.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.enterpriseName},'%')
AND ci.enterprise_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.enterpriseCode},'%')
order by ci.create_date desc

select ci.id, ci.expert_code, ci.enterprise_code, ci.create_date, ei.name, ei.nationality, ei.images, ei.sex, ei.political_status, ei.native_place, ei.employer, ei.`position`, ei.address, ei.phone, ei.level_one, ei.level_two, ei.birth_date, ei.job_title, ei.special_appellation, ei.mail, ei.fixed_telephone, ei.profile from collect_info ci left join expert_info ei on (ei.code = ci.expert_code) left join enterprise_info ei2 on (ei2.code = ci.enterprise_code) where 1 = 1 AND ci.enterprise_code = #{enterpriseCode} order by ci.create_date desc

select.if:
select ci.`type` , ci.id , ci.create_date , ci.expert_code , ci.base_id , pli.title, pli.post_name, pli.payment_method, pli.academic, pli.work_time, pli.work_hour, pli.work_address, pli.salary, exi.name as expertName, exi.images as expertImages, eni.name as enterName, eni.images as enterImages from collect_info ci left join pluralism_info pli on (pli.id = ci.base_id) left join expert_info exi on (exi.code = ci.expert_code) left join enterprise_info eni on (eni.id = pli.enterprise_id) where 1 = 1
AND exi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.expertName},'%')
AND eni.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.enterpriseName},'%')
AND pli.post_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.postName},'%')
and ci.`type` = 2 order by ci.create_date desc

select ci.`type` , ci.id , ci.create_date , ci.expert_code , ci.base_id , pi.post_name, pi.academic, pi.work_time, pi.work_hour, pi.work_address, pi.salary, exi.name as expertName, exi.images as expertImages, eni.name as enterName, eni.images as enterImages from collect_info ci left join post_info pi on (pi.id = ci.base_id) left join expert_info exi on (exi.code = ci.expert_code) left join enterprise_info eni on (eni.id = pl.enterprise_id) where 1 = 1
AND exi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.expertName},'%')
AND eni.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.enterpriseName},'%')
AND pli.post_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.postName},'%')
and ci.`type` = 3 order by ci.create_date desc

select ci.`type` , ci.id , ci.create_date , ci.expert_code , ci.base_id , exi.name as expertName, exi.images as expertImages, eni.name as enterName, eni.images as enterImages from collect_info ci left join enterprise_info eni on (eni.id = ci.base_id) left join expert_info exi on (exi.code = ci.expert_code) where 1 = 1
AND exi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.expertName},'%')
AND eni.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.enterpriseName},'%')
and ci.`type` = 1 order by ci.create_date desc
